cheat.modid.flight.name: Fly
cheat.modid.flight.description: Allows you to fly like in creative mode
cheat.modid.fullbright.name: FullBright
cheat.modid.fullbright.description: Allows you to always see like it's daytime.
cheat.modid.speed.name: Speed
cheat.modid.speed.description: Allows you to walk or fly faster.
cheat.modid.noclip.name: NoClip
cheat.modid.noclip.description: Allows you to walk through walls.
cheat.modid.fastbreak.name: FastBreak
cheat.modid.fastbreak.description: Allows you to break blocks faster.
cheat.modid.spider.name: Spider
cheat.modid.spider.description: Allows you to climb walls like a spider.
cheat.modid.nofall.name: NoFall
cheat.modid.nofall.description: Prevents you from receiving fall damage.
cheat.modid.speedmine.name: Speedmine
cheat.modid.speedmine.description: Allows you to mine blocks faster.
cheat.modid.reach.name: Reach
cheat.modid.reach.description: Allows you to reach further with your hands.
cheat.modid.autofish.name: AutoFish
cheat.modid.autofish.description: Automatically casts and reels in a fishing rot.
